Database Seeds

  • categories
  • datatypes
  • guides
  • steps
  • lines
  • revisions

Database Relationships

  • user has one image (image belongs to one user)
  • user has many notifications (notification belongs to one user)
  • user has many announcements (announcements belong to many users)
  • user has many invitations (invitations belong to many users)
  • team has many users (users belong to many teams)
  • team has one image (image can belong to many teams)
  • guide has one image (image can belong to many guides)
  • guide has one datatype (datatype belongs to many guides)
  • guide has one category (categories belong to many guides)
  • guide has one type (type belongs to many guides)
  • guide has one device (device belongs to many guides)
  • guide has many revisions (revision belongs to one guides)
  • step has many revisions (revision belongs to one steps)
  • step has many images (image can belong to many steps)
  • step has many lines (line belongs to one step)
  • revision has one status (status belongs to many revisions)
